name: CHHapticParameterCurve.ControlPoint
desc: A single control point in a parameter curve.

items.name: init(relativeTime: TimeInterval, value: Float)
items.desc: Creates a control point from its time and value.

items.name: var relativeTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time at which the associated parameter reaches this value, relative to the start time of the parameter curve.

items.name: var value: Float
items.desc: The parameter value of the point.
